name: No-Gun Shotgun
description:
No-Gun Shotgun is a tower-defense platformer, where your shotgun is useless against monsters.

The only way you can really fight the waves of monsters is by building turrets. But the turrets beak all the time, so one use for your shotgun is activating them. You can also use the shotgun for double or triple jumps!

This is an entry to the Mini Jam 117 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-117-ghosts)

Note: it's 2AM right now, I'm super tired and the game still isn't very polished, there aren't as many levels as I would like and etc. Sorry if you encounter bugs or other issues...

Info

 Engine is Godot 3.4.4

 Most of the pixelart is made by me, apart from some FX

 All of the sounds are free sounds from the internet
